clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Liver appears mildly thickened with no focal lesions.
Placenta is hyperechoic and normally located.
Major vessels show smooth-walled waveform on Doppler.
Common bile duct measures 21.41 mm, within normal limits.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
